entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
